attributes.action: Rescue British citizens stranded in India because of Coronavirus lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: The total lockdown in India means that even if there were flights to the UK, people cannot travel to airports. My niece, her husband and three small children have no way of getting home. Things in India can only get worse, and we fear for their safety.
attributes.background: Arrange with the Indian authorities to bring home British citizens who are stranded in India.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307260

Since you started your petition the Government has announced a new government partnership with airlines to fly back more tourists stranded abroad: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/new-government-partnership-with-airlines-to-fly-back-more-tourists-stranded-abroad

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
